snippet: Questions about cost of life-saving pet treatments, a community college is asked to delay a two-tier tuition plan, why elderly won't get hearing aids and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Are Life-Saving Pet Treatments Worth the Cost?
